title: Bug 121170 - get column label from meta data object should return some user recognizable strings
OB: The getcolumnlabel function from the meta data object is not returning any user recognizable strings.
EB: The getcolumnlabel function from the meta data object should return meaningful labels that can be recognized and understood by the end user.
SR:
1. Create a meta data object.
2. Use the getcolumnlabel function on one of the columns.
3. Verify that the returned label is a user recognizable string.
